description: Sleek fitted leather trousers in black

core:description.text: Supple black leather trousers that fit like a second skin, hugging the form from waist to ankle. The leather's smooth surface has a subtle sheen that catches light with movement, while its flexibility ensures comfort without sacrificing the sleek silhouette. These versatile bottoms serve as a gothic wardrobe staple, pairing effortlessly with everything from flowing robes to structured jackets. The ankle-length cut showcases dramatic footwear while maintaining a streamlined aesthetic.
